title: Personal Virtual Assistant – Smart, Reliable, and Detail-Oriented
job_overview:
???? Job Description:

I’m looking for a part-time personal assistant to simplify and organise my life. You’ll handle recurring personal tasks so I can focus on higher-priority work.

This role starts at 5–10 hours per week, with the potential to grow. You must be fluent in English, responsive, and able to follow instructions precisely.

?

???? Your Tasks Will Include:
 • Booking travel, appointments, and reservations
 • Researching services, products, and options
 • Following up with customer service or service providers
 • Online purchases and form filling
 • Managing reminders, calendars, and to-do lists
 • Occasionally making phone calls on my behalf (UK/US)

?

???? Required Skills:
 • Excellent English (spoken and written)
 • Strong attention to detail and reliability
 • Comfort using Gmail, Google Calendar, Trello/Notion
 • Proactive and independent
 • Able to join occasional UK-time calls or make calls on my behalf
 • Discreet and professional with sensitive information

?

???? Bonus If You Have Experience With:
 • Personal or executive assistance
 • Lifestyle or travel coordination
 • Supporting founders or entrepreneurs

?

???? How to Apply (Read Carefully):
 1. Start your message with: “I make life easier – [Your First Name]”
 2. Write a short message (under 100 words) about why you’re right for the role
 3. Include your hourly rate and UK-time availability
 4. List 3 personal tasks you’ve done before
 5. (Optional) Add a short voice note or Loom link introducing yourself

?

? Work Hours & Timezone:
 • 5–10 hours/week to start
 • Some availability during UK daytime hours required
